channel.title: Gah. plz help

item.title: Gah. plz help
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hmmm i think you are going about this all wrong,

Although i am only used to coding one way

Anyway would this not be more useful:

open your client.java

search for //portals

keep searching untill you find

//portals case $$$$ etc

Now you need to find your guilddoor id - i do not know it so ill just give an example

Now find your first case and above it add:

[code]case $$$$: // door id
if(playerLevel[2] >= 99) { // saying that your strength needs to be 99
sendMessage(“You enter the Guild!”);
teleportToX = &&&&; //your coord X here
teleportToY = &&&&; // your coord Y here
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 99 Strength to enter this guild!”);
}
break;

[/code]

Best of luck to you

Basicly this is saying when you click object $$$$ and your strength is 99 it will teleport you to the coordinates you type in, if you do not have 99 strength it will say that you need 99 strength to enter

Read full topic
